str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.

str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
